name: Lando's Not A System, He's A Man
Lore: 'Lando Calrissian has quite a reputation amongst gamblers and smugglers. This is not always a good thing.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Once per turn, may target a character present with [Cloud City] Lando. For remainder of turn, target is forfeit = 0. During battle on Cloud City, you may use X Force (maximum 3) to add X to your total battle destiny. (Immune to Alter.)',
